subject: Disable Context for AArch64 build
commitMessage:
Disable Context for AArch64 build

Context library relies on some inline assembly.
Current version does not contain AArch64 version of assembly.
Disable it for now.

Change-Id: I984abdee57d8ba32a95b3418dd3621f5c6127bd5
Signed-off-by: Yury Usishchev <y.usishchev@samsung.com>

comments.message: Uploaded patch set 1.

Patch Set 1: Verified+1

This patch does not break armv7l and i586 build and enables aarch64 build. Build results are available here:  original( https://build.tizen.org/package/show?package=boost_fail&project=devel%3Aarm_toolchain%3AMobile%3Atest ) and patched ( https://build.tizen.org/package/show?package=boost&project=devel%3Aarm_toolchain%3AMobile%3Atest )

Patch Set 1: Code-Review+2

We do not have aarch64 context library, yet.
Please add it when it is available.
Change has been successfully merged into the git repository.

A SR (Submit Request) has been triggered to submit the commit to OBS Tizen:Mobile project.
- Submitter: Chanho Park <chanho61.park@samsung.com>

- Tag: submit/tizen/20140722.061742

subject: Apply patch to protect invalid UTF8 sequences and overflow of ordered_malloc()
commitMessage:
Apply patch to protect invalid UTF8 sequences and overflow of ordered_malloc()

Signed-off-by: dahyeong.kim <dahyeong.kim@samsung.com>

comments.message:
Patch Set 1:

Detail explanations.

- boost/pool/pool.hpp :
ordered_malloc() (similar to calloc()) size overflow, upstream patch:
https://svn.boost.org/trac/boost/changeset/78326

- boost/locale/utf.hpp :
Please refer to below websites.
http://www.boost.org/users/news/boost_locale_security_notice.html
https://svn.boost.org/trac/boost/ticket/7743

Patch Set 1: Verified+1 Code-Review+2

Merging external/boost patches
Change has been successfully merged into the git repository.

- Git project: platform/upstream/boost
- Tag: submit/tizen/20130827.055530
- Commit: 2c102b0a5b44bcefbddda6f49a68138adaa23ddb Apply patch to protect invalid UTF8 sequences and overflow of ordered_malloc()
